# Glossary

__Measurement__: A numerical variable

__Observation__: An observation is the factor name given to a value (measurement), at a particular period, of a particular variable.

__Variable__: A variable is a characteristic of a unit being observed that may assume more than one of a set of values to which a numerical measure or a category from a classification can be assigned (e.g. income, age, weight, etc., and “occupation”, “industry”, “disease”, etc
